channel.title: 5 errors! help please!
channel.description:
i was adding some stuff and then 5 erros came up
here look at them
client.java:13689: illegal start of type if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullAssassinEquipped()) { ^ client.java:13689: <identifier> expected if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullAssassinEquipped()) { ^ client.java:13689: <identifier> expected if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullAssassinEquipped()) { ^ client.java:13689: invalid method declaration; return type required if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullAssassinEquipped()) { ^ client.java:13689: ';' expected if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullAssassinEquipped()) { ^
how can i fix that? please help me, please
tyvm for you time i hope u can post a solution
